twoSetSkill.name: Nymph√©as 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Receive a Lightning Shield. When the shield is active, the host's attacks gain 30% Lightning DMG. When hit by enemies, the shield will negate direct Physical DMG from the enemy and disappear after 0.3s. Shield reappears after 15s.

threeSetSkill.name: Soleil Levant 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: After triggering the Move Slow debuff of stigma (B) of this set, enemies within a 3.0-meter radius of the target suffer 30% Move Slow for 10s. Host also heals for 8% HP.
